name: Innodan
overview:
Innodan Pte ltd, is a Singapore based marketing technology and service provider. Our goal is to provide professional marketing tools and services, to help marketers plan, execute and measure effective marketing campaigns.

Disconnected and obsolete marketing data is one of the biggest challenges for many marketers. Executing timely, relevant and personalized campaigns is a major challenge, when marketing data is spread across disconnected systems like CRM, Web analytics and email marketing. As consumers and buyers have embraced the internet and their buying process is changing, marketers can no longer rely on mass email blasting and one to many communication.

To meet the demand for actionable marketing intelligence, we offer a suite of marketing tools and services that enable marketers to plan, execute and measure integrated marketing campaigns. Our marketing tools are designed for marketing professionals, which means that marketers can update campaign sites, create new landing pages and design email campaigns, without involving their IT department. With all your marketing data in one place, campaigns can be highly targeted and personalized, to engage your audience in relevant and timely conversations.
